meanings.definition: In a lazy or idle manner
meanings.sent1: She walked otiosely along the path, taking her time to enjoy the scenery.
meanings.sent2: He sat otiosely on the couch, watching TV without a care in the world.
meanings.sent3: The cat yawned otiosely, clearly uninterested in catching the mouse.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass otiosely as they lounged by the pool, savoring the moment.
meanings.sent5: The old man moved otiosely, his steps slow and deliberate, enjoying the simple act of walking.

meanings.sent1: The abandoned building stood otiosely at the end of the street, forgotten by all.
meanings.sent2: Her otiosely collected trinkets cluttered the shelves, gathering dust over time.
meanings.sent3: The broken clock ticked otiosely on the wall, its hands frozen in time.
meanings.sent4: The old car sat otiosely in the garage, no longer able to serve its original function.
meanings.sent5: The empty field lay otiosely under the sun, devoid of any purpose or activity.
